mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tm_product_review WHERE p_code=#{p_code} ORDER BY rev_no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tm_product_review(rev_no, rev_title, rev_content, rev_hits, p_code, u_id) VALUES(tm_product_review_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{rev_title}, #{rev_content},#{rev_hits}, #{p_code}, #{u_id})
mapper.update: UPDATE tm_product_review SET rev_title=#{rev_title} , rev_content=#{rev_content} WHERE u_id=#{u_id}
